ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC!
The start of a bold new adventure! Mother Forest is beset by a terrible plague that sickens the very jungle, but this deadly evil is not the only danger Sheena must face. A ruthless huntress prowls the forest, seeking a girl with golden hair, and the mark of the jaguarâ€¦
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Maria Sanapo & Ceci de la Cruz | 1 | B | Cover B | Marco Santucci & Mariacristina Federico | 2 | C | Cover C | Dan Parent | 3 | D | Cosplay Cover D | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Maria Sanapo | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Marco Santucci | 6 | G/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Dan Parent | 7 | H/LE | Limited Edition Contest Variant Cover, Limited to 25 | Roberto Castro | 8 | I/LE | Limited Edition Contest "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 10 | Roberto Castro | 9 |
